column18: To the shareholders of Mynewsdesk ApS
column23: The annual report is presented in accordance with the Danish Financial Statements Act.
column24: In my opinion, the financial statements give a true and fair view of the Entityâs financial position at 31.12.2017 and of the results of its operations for the financial year 01.01.2017 - 31.12.2017.
column32: Profit for the financial year amounts to DKK 377 thousand which is in line with Managementâs expectations. For 2018 Management expects to generate positive results.
column33: Current tax payable or receivable is recognised in the balance sheet, stated as tax computed on this year's taxable income, adjusted for prepaid tax
column34: Amortisation, depreciation and impairment losses relating to property, plant and equipment comprise amortisation, depreciation and impairment losses for the financial year, calculated on the basis of the residual values and useful lives of the individual assets and impairment testing as well as gains and losses from the sale of property, plant and equipment.
column35: Cash comprises cash in hand and bank deposits.
column36: Prepayments comprise incurred costs relating to subsequent financial years. Prepayments are measured at cost.
column37: Staff costs comprise salaries and wages as well as social security contributions, pension contributions, etc for entity staff.
column38: Other external expenses include expenses relating to the Entityâs ordinary activities, including expenses for premises, stationery and office supplies, marketing costs, etc. This item also includes writedowns of receivables recognised in current assets.
column39: Other financial expenses comprise interest expenses, including interest expenses on payables to group enterprises.
column40: Receivables are measured at amortised cost, usually equalling nominal value less writedowns for bad and doubtful debts.
column41: Other financial liabilities are measured at amortised cost, which usually corresponds to nominal value.
column42: Receivables are measured at amortised cost, usually equalling nominal value less writedowns for bad and doubtful debts.
column43: Revenue from the sale of services is recognised in the income statement when delivery is made to the buyer. Revenue is recognised net of VAT, duties and sales discounts and is measured at fair value of the consideration fixed.
column44: Tax for the year, which consists of current tax for the year and changes in deferred tax, is recognised in the income statement by the portion attributable to the profit for the year and recognised directly in equity by the portion attributable to entries directly in equity.
column45: No events have occurred after the balance sheet date to this date, which would influence the evaluation of this annual report.
column46: The accounting policies applied to these financial statements are consistent with those applied last year.
column47: Share capital consists of 800 shares at DKK 100. The shares have not been divided into classes.
column55: The Executive Board have today considered and approved the annual report of Mynewsdesk ApS for the financial year 01.01.2017 - 31.12.2017.
column56: We have performed an extended review of the financial statements of Mynewsdesk ApS for the financial year 01.01.2017 - 31.12.2017. The financial statements, which comprise the income statement, balance sheet, statement of changes in equity, notes and accounting policies, are prepared in accordance with the Danish Financial Statements Act.
column57: This annual report has been presented in accordance with the provisions of the Danish Financial Statements Act governing reporting class B enterprises.
column59: I believe that the management commentary contains a fair review of the affairs and conditions referred to therein.
column66: Based on our extended review, in our opinion, the financial statements give a true and fair view of the Entityâs financial position at 31.12.2017 and of the results of its operations for the financial year 01.01.2017 - 31.12.2017 in accordance with the Danish Financial Statements Act.
column76: I recommend the annual report for adoption at the Annual General Meeting.
